contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of April, 2012, the Commonwealth’s Application for Relief is GRANTED, and this appeal is DISMISSED AS MOOT. See e.g. Spencer v. Kemna, 523 U.S. 1, 7, 118 S.Ct. 978, 140 L.Ed.2d 43 (1998); Pap’s A.M. v. City of Erie, 571 Pa. 375, 812 A.2d 591, 599 (2002).
